00034 /*
00035         "Front" View, screen
00036 
00037 
00038              ViewY
00039   offset   |
00040         +----------------> ScreenX
00041         |          |            |
00042         |          |            |
00043         |          |            |
00044         |----------------
00045     v      |
00046    SceenY  |
00047                    |
00048   ---------+------------> ViewX
00049           Oview
00050 
00051         The offset (screen offset) is measured in view coordinates
00052         from the view origin to the offset point.
00053 
00054 
00055         "Side" View, word
00056 
00057         WorldZ
00058         |
00059         |
00060         |     ViewY
00061         |     /
00062         |    /
00063         |   / 
00064         |  /
00065         | /
00066         |/
00067         +---------------------WorldY
00068         |\_
00069         |  \_
00070         |    \_ ViewZ
00071 
00072 
00073         "Top" View, Map (Should be right angles)
00074 
00075                           WorldY
00076                            /|\
00077                           /     | \
00078                          /      |  \
00079                 MapY \  |  /Mapx
00080                           \     | /
00081                            \|/
00082         ---------------------- WorldX
00083 */
00084
